Key Match Events: Alexis Mac Allister scored in the 48th minute.
Julián Álvarez scored in the 84th minute.
Paulo Dybala scored in the 90'+1' minute.
Post-Match Reflections: Ale Moreno reacted to Argentina's comfortable win over Chile in their first competitive fixture since 2013 without Lionel Messi or Angel Di Maria.
Argentina's dominance was noted despite the absence of Lionel Messi and Ángel Di María, who received a tribute at the Monumental stadium after his international retirement.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Argentina's win left them with 18 points, five clear of second-placed Uruguay.
The match was held at Mâs Monumental stadium with an attendance of 52,160.
